features: Lightweight aluminum frame and sleek 3-wheel design
Accepts all Chicco KeyFit and Fit2 infant car seats
Multi-position reclining seat and adjustable canopy
Parent and child trays with cup holders, large storage basket
body.description: Product Description For ultimate convenience, the Chicco Viaro Stroller has a sleek three-wheel design, lightweight aluminum frame, and one-hand quick fold. A pull-strap and button are conveniently tucked under the seat and easy to activate simultaneously for a compact, free-standing fold. The stroller is even easier to open again after closing.For older babies and toddlers, the Viaro includes a multi-position backrest, adjustable canopy, and detachable tray with two cup holders. For younger babies, the Viaro accepts all KeyFit and Fit2 infant car seats with click-in attachment.The Viaro has a padded handle, parent tray with two cup holders, and a large basket that is easily accessible from the front or back. A swiveling front wheel and suspension help maintain a smooth ride from surface to surface. Toe-tap rear brakes keep the stroller in place when parked. Brand Story By Chicco

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Storage Basket Large basket accommodates diaper bags, toys, snacks and other on-the-go essentials. Child Tray Includes detachable child tray with two cup holders and storage area. Parent Tray Padded handle and parent tray with two cup holders and storage area. Travel-Friendly Sleek 3-wheel design and lightweight frame simplify outings and getaways. One-Hand Fold Compact and free-standing quick fold for easy storage. Accepts a Car Seat Click-in attachment for all KeyFit and Fit2 infant car seats. Viaro Travel System includes KeyFit 30 infant car seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So smooth and maneuverable!
reviews.reviewText: I had a stroller from Graco made 5 years ago when my son was born that I loved. And because I loved it, it was hard to find a replacement that was close enough to it that it made me happy. This one is pretty great.The basket is big enough that I can fit all manner of things in there for my 5 year old and my baby and myself (with shopping). The cup holders for the adults and the child are so, so nice. My last stroller had one cup holder for the child and the other was a curved opening for snacks, so the cup always got put into that one and then fell out on the dirty ground... This one just has two cup holders for the kid which is GREAT!! The canopy is really quite big so it covers the kid from the sun really well without having to rig up a blanket cover as well. And the stroller glides so nice and can make super sharp turns when you are trying to not run over your other kid who is acting like an animal in a small store aisle!The only thing that does kind of irk me is that this stroller doesn't have a lock once it is collapsed. It is nice for unfolding it quickly but it also unfolds when you don't want it to while trying to move it somewhere else... If you hold it by the strap inside the folding mechanism it doesn't do this, but if that strap breaks it would be hard to both carry it anywhere and also to fold it up anymore. And as we all know, the more you use something the more likely it is to break so I'd rather not carry the stroller around by that strap. I mean the strap is well made so probably won't break and you don't really move the folded stroller all that much, but it is still kind of a design flaw.Otherwise, the stroller is super great and definitely hit most of the points on this picky mom's checklist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO GOOD!! - will update as time passes…
reviews.reviewText: I have been trying to talk myself into converting from our Doona to a convertible seat and stroller (as needed.)The fact that this actually works with one hand (so far) is amazing. It’s light enough for me to carry a decent distance (even with holding baby) without my biceps burning, which also helps a lot. Great storage and overall for the price, absolutely worth the purchase so far.TIP: I purchased a “like new” condition item that was coming in different packaging than the typical shipping packaging and saved another $30. The stroller itself was perfectly fine. No scratches or damage on the actual product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is horrible. So heavy I can hardly get it in ...
reviews.reviewText: As the mother of four young children (ranging in age from 6 years to 4 months) I have owned more strollers than I can count. This is by far the easiest, and possibly the lightest, stroller I have ever used. The weight is what sold me initially. I bought the Chicco Activ3 Jogging stroller just after our fourth baby was born hoping it would be the last stroller I ever purchased. It is horrible. So heavy I can hardly get it in my van, always pulls to one side, and has no storage underneath. I bought this last month after becoming so frustrated with how difficult the jogger is to use. This stroller has been wonderful. It is so light I can lift it with one hand. It folds faster than any stroller I've ever seen, and the car seat snaps in so easily. The storage underneath is wonderful. The three wheel design makes it so much easier to steer in aisles. I highly recommend this stroller!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: The chicco shuttle frame is amazing! My fit 2 car seat clicks right in so easily and it comes off by pressing the orange bar on the back just like the car seat base. It’s great for when baby is sleeping so he shouldn’t wake up. It’s super light and easy to fold, takes up very little space. Perfect for walks around the neighborhood. The large basket on the bottom, cup holders and storage pocket are perfect as well! Great product, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and well equipped stroller.
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller! Super easy to maneuver, lightweight (I am 5’5” and 120lbs) and I can easily lift this into the back of my Mitsubishi Outlander. Very easy to fold and awesome storage capacity underneath. The tray and cup holders were a selling point for us, also. It looks very nice in person and is sturdy. The only two things that I’ve noticed about it that I’m not entirely in love with is the short seat doesn’t seem like it will suit a toddler well (my daughter is only 8 months old now) and she would slide right out if she weren’t buckled because of the weird angle? also, it isn’t very padded inside. It doesn’t seem very comfortable so we’re looking for inserts of some sort. This is simple enough to use as an every day stroller and equipped for longer strolls or outings so no need to buy multiple strollers for us. We’ve taken it into different terrains and it isn’t bumpy, seems to ride pretty smoothly and it’s awesome paired with the Chicco Keyfit type infant car seats. The hood works great and covers the infant seat completely without seeming as if it’s suffocating baby in there, super roomy. The hood is smooth and doesn’t get stuck. It’s quiet and effortless to adjust at different intervals. The hood helped keep her warm in the fall and the sun out of her eyes on bright days. I also love that the hood opens from both sides so that baby can sleep without being disturbed when we peek in on her. Our daughter loves riding in her stroller. 4 stars because of the weird seat. Hopefully we can get past it because we loved this with the infant seat. Will update in a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spacious and convenient
reviews.reviewText: My 2 yr old is almost 38" tall and he still has plenty of leg and head room! The seat and pretty wide and padded. So easy to fold and maneuvers very smoothly. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite stroller
reviews.reviewText: I love this stroller so much. Lightweight and durable, super easy to fold and unfold. I love how much storage space the basket underneath has and how easy it is to access it.If you travel with it, remove he tray and pack t in your bag!! Our tray broke off on a flight due to the airline not handling it very nicely and as such I could no longer use the car seat with it, but I ended up buying a second stroller since I’m expecting again and can’t live without this stroller when I have a newborn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s worth the money
reviews.reviewText: One of the best strollers I’ve ever purchased love mines it so heavy duty can easily swivel everything perfect my son loves it ❤️❤️
Muy buena calidad y súper bien precio, es lo que necesitaba
